newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Forte estimates raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Forte estimates raised.

text.p: --Robertson, Stephens & Co analyst Marshall Senk on Monday raised his earnings estimates on Forte Software Inc and reiterated his buy rating.
--Senk raised his FY1997 EPS estimate to $0.24 from $0.20 and his FY1998 EPS estimate to $0.40 from $0.36.

--said Q3 was a phenomenal quarter for Forte, providing further evidence that the company continues to execute well and that demand for its high-end client/server application development environment continues to accelerate.
--said the higher estimates reflect the company's strong competitive position. --shares of Forte Software were 2-5/8 higher at 35-5/8 in afternoon trading on Nasdaq.
